ThingDef.label: fish sauce
ThingDef.description:
A savory, fermented liquid made from fish, commonly used as a flavorful condiment. It adds a deep, umami-rich taste to dishes, enhancing both depth and complexity.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 25 fish sauce requires 50 fish with an average of 1.1 value, for a total value of 55, and sells for 5, giving a <color=#33CC33>56.00%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Fermentation time:</color> 7 days.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.2 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>25</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.40</color> (for reference, Yayo is 0.35).
